  • Method Details

    • isRegistrableProyect

      public boolean isRegistrableProyect()
      This method checks if its posible to register another project.
      Returns:
      : boolean false if it isn't posible to register another project or true if it is possible.

    • registerProject

      public int registerProject(String projectName, String clientName, Calendar initialDate, Calendar finalDate, double budget, String proyectsManagerName, String proyectsManagerCellphone, String clientsManagerName, String clientsManagerCellphone)
      This method adds a new project to the array of projects.
      Parameters:
      projectName - : String the name of the new project to add.
      clientName - : String the name of the client of GreenSQA
      initialDate - : Calendar the projects planned start date.
      finalDate - : Calendar the projects planned end date.
      budget - : Double the projects budget.
      proyectsManagerName - : String the name of the manager of the project.
      proyectsManagerCellphone - : String the cellphone of the manager of the project.
      clientsManagerName - : String the name of the clients manager.
      clientsManagerCellphone - : String the cellphone of the clients manager.
      Returns:
      : int the position in which the project is going to.

    • getFirstValidPosition

      public int getFirstValidPosition()
      search in the array of projects if exists one valid position
      Returns:
      :int the method returns -1 if the position does not exist, a number in [0, 9] if exist a valid position.

    • addPhases

      public void addPhases(int[] monthsPerPhase, int projectPosition)
      this method adds the phases to a project.
      Parameters:
      monthsPerPhase - : the array of the duration of each phase in months.
      projectPosition - : the position of the project in which the phases are to be added, in the projects array.

    • setPhasesPlannedDates

      public void setPhasesPlannedDates(int projectPosition, Calendar startDate, int[] monthsPerPhase)
      This method calculates the planned dates for each phase based on its duration in months.
      Parameters:
      projectPosition - : the position of the project in which the phases are to be added, in the projects array.
      startDate - : the start date of the first phase.
      monthsPerPhase - : the array of the duration of each phase in months.

    • culminatePhase

      public String culminatePhase(int positionProject)
      This method calls the method that culminates the current active phase in a registered proyect and sends a message.
      Parameters:
      positionProject - : the position of the project in which the current active phase is going to be culimanated, in the projects array.
      Returns:
      : String a message indicating that there is no active phase in the project or indicating the phase that has end.

    • registerCapsule

      public String registerCapsule(int projecPosition, String id, String description, int capsuleTypeOption, String collaboratorsName, String collaboratorsPosition, String learnedLesson)
      This method calls the method that adds a new capsule and sends a message.
      Parameters:
      projecPosition - : int the position of the project in which the capsule is going to be add in the current active phase.
      id - : String the id of the capsule.
      description - : String the description of the new capsule.
      capsuleTypeOption - : int the type selected by the user.
      collaboratorsName - : String the name of the collaborator that registered the capsule.
      collaboratorsPosition - : String the position of the collaborator that registered th capsule.
      learnedLesson - : String the collaborators learned lesson.
      Returns:
      a message indicating that the capsuloe has been registered.

    • isProjectAvailable

      public boolean isProjectAvailable(int pos)
      Checks if there is an active phase in a proyect.
      Parameters:
      pos - : int the position of the project in the array of projects.
      Returns:
      false if there is no active phase in the project or true if there is an active phase.

    • isPhaseCapsulesLimitReached

      public boolean isPhaseCapsulesLimitReached(int pos)
      This method checks if its posible to register another capsule.
      Parameters:
      pos - : int the position of the project in the array of projects.
      Returns:
      : boolean false if it isn't posible to register another capsule or true if it is possible.

    • isIdAlreadyRegistered

      public boolean isIdAlreadyRegistered(int pos, String idInput)
      Checks if an id input already exists in another capsule.
      Parameters:
      pos - : int the position of the project in the array of projects.
      idInput - : String the id that was typed by the user.
      Returns:
      false if the id typed by the user doesn't exist or true if the id typed by the user already exists.

    • approveCapsule

      public String approveCapsule(int projecPosition, String capsuleIdSearch)
      Checks if there is an capsule with an especified id and, if it finds it, approves capsule.
      Parameters:
      projecPosition - : int the position of the project in the array of projects.
      capsuleIdSearch - : String the especified id.
      Returns:
      : String a message indicating that the capsule was not found or indicating that it was approved.

    • obtainCapsuleLink

      public String obtainCapsuleLink(int projecPosition, String capsuleIdSearch)
      Checks if there is an capsule with an especified id and, if it finds it, publish the capsule.
      Parameters:
      projecPosition - : int the position of the project in the array of projects.
      capsuleIdSearch - : String the especified id.
      Returns:
      : String a message indicating that the capsule was not found or indicating that it was published and shows the url.

    • calculateProjectsCapsulePerType

      public String calculateProjectsCapsulePerType()
      This method counts the amount of registered capsules per type
      Returns:
      returns a message with the amount of capsules per type

    • obtainPhasesLearnedLessons

      public String obtainPhasesLearnedLessons(int phasePosition)
      This method obtains the learned lessons in a particular phase.
      Parameters:
      phasePosition - : int the position on the array of phases in the clas project
      Returns:
      returns a message with the learned lessons or, if there is no registered project yet, a message indicating this.

    • obtainProjectsNameWithMostCapsules

      public String obtainProjectsNameWithMostCapsules()
      This method checks which project has the most capsules registered
      Returns:
      a message with the name of the project or, if if there is no registered project yet, a message indicating this.

    • collaboratorHasRegisteredCapsule

      public String collaboratorHasRegisteredCapsule(String collaboratorsName)
      This method checks if a collaborator has registered a capsules.
      Parameters:
      collaboratorsName - : the name of the searched collaborator
      Returns:
      a message indicating if the collaborator has or not wrote any capsule yet.

    • obtainPublishedCapsulesInfo

      public String obtainPublishedCapsulesInfo(String hashtag)
      This method checks if there is an approved and published capsule with an especific hashtag.
      Parameters:
      hashtag - : the keyword highlighted by the two hasthags.
      Returns:
      a message indicating the capsule information or if it was not found.

    • searchProject

      public int searchProject(String projectSearch)
      This method searchs if there is a project with an especified name.
      Parameters:
      projectSearch - : String the especified projects name.
      Returns:
      : int it returns -1 if there is no project with that especified name or a number between [0,9] if it is.
